p.span: Readington Township Schools Focus Efforts on Wellness and SEL - This year the district has continued to infuse the five core SEL competencies into the daily lives of students through specific techniques and practices. Supervisor of SEL and Special Projects, Anthony Tumolo, along with the assistance and support of many, including the District Counselors, have jointly led the charge to assist teachers in finding ways to infuse SEL in their daily instruction. For an SEL update, please click here.

a.title: Go to comments for Readington Township Schools Focus Efforts on Wellness and SEL

td.style: border-style: solid; border-color: black; vertical-align: top;
border-style: solid; border-color: black; vertical-align: top;

p.span: Suggestion Box - To send suggestions/correspondence to the Board of Education, p

lease use the email address listed below. Any email correspondence written to Board members directly at this email address may be reported out in public session. If you have a specific request, comment or concern, please feel free to email the appropriate department administrator for assistance. Contact information can be found under the "Our District" tab on the website.
